author: Robertas Janovskis
description: MUDDLE lemongrass, lime juice and sugar in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, shake with 50/50 mix of cubed and crushed ice. Fine strain into chilled glass.
name: Lithuanian Daiquiri

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE lemongrass, lime juice and sugar in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, shake with 50/50 mix of cubed and crushed ice
